dialogue.text: Oh? The fast food place? I do go there every now and then to grab a quick bite.
Not much else to say about it though.
Don't look at me like that-
C'mon, Sunny. I can't be the one bringing up all the cool things about you. You gotta say it.
We really don't have to-
Viewers, it's time for a SynSun fun fact! To most of you guys, Uncle Hearty is just the name of a restaurant, but not to Sunny!
And that's because… drumroll please…
Sunny's uncle is THE Uncle Hearty himself! How cool is that?
I mean, yeah… he is a really cool uncle. I just don't like feeling like I'm someone important purely out of relation to him, y'know?
But I can't thank him enough. He is the one who helped build this studio for us.
He's quite the character. We wanted to just make a small setup in your bedroom for this show initially, then he came in with the whole shebang and made our own little mini studio.
Being bombastic and extra is definitely his thing. Anyone who's ever been to Uncle Hearty's can attest to that.
Every month he's always landing some crazy deal or sponsorship. That's why the menu items are always over the top.
It ends up working out so much with how many people on social media talk about it. The place gets crazy attention all the time.
Must suck for all those employees having to deal with hundreds of vloggers and social media junkies flooding the place all the time.
It's definitely a lot, but my uncle understands that. That's why the pay there is crazy good for a fast food place. It evens things out.
Hey, you think we can ask him to toss up an advertisement for our stream somewhere in the restaurant?
We don't gotta go that far-
Why not? You think he'll say no?
No, it's because he WILL say yes, and it's gonna be really awkward walking into that place and being immediately recognized.
Heh heh, fair enough.
